thread.title: Генеральный секретарь ФФУ: "Контракт с Шевченко рассчитан до лета 2018-го"
thread.title_full: Генеральный секретарь ФФУ: "Контракт с Шевченко рассчитан до лета 2018-го"

posts.title: Генеральный секретарь ФФУ: "Контракт с Шевченко рассчитан до лета 2018-го"
posts.text:
Украина Генеральный секретарь ФФУ: "Контракт с Шевченко рассчитан до лета 2018-го" 
Генеральный секретарь ФФУ Юрий Записоцкий подчеркнул: члены Исполкома Федерации остались довольны отчетом главного тренера сборной Украины Андрея Шевченко , однако говорить о новом контракте пока что преждевременно. 

- Все ждали первого вопроса повестки дня. Мы заслушали отчет главного тренера национальной команды, а также рассмотрели несколько важных процедурных моментов по Премьер-лиге, ПФЛ, изменениям в календаре . Также обсудили материалы рабочей группы по реформе профессионального футбола . 

На данный момент у Андрея Шевченко есть действующий контракт, который рассчитан до лета 2018 года. Сегодня мы заслушали отчет главного тренера, а сам Андрей Николаевич предложил спустя месяц-два презентовать свою программу на будущее. Сроки действующего контракта это позволяют. Исполком, Комитет национальных сборных команд ее детально проанализируют и изучат. И затем будет принято соответствующее решение. Новый контракт до 2020-го? Нет. Я уже видел информацию в прессе. Однако речь об этом вообще не шла. 

В выступлениях членов Исполкома, а это и руководитель Комитета национальных сборных Мирон Маркевич , и технический директор Олег Протасов , оценки деятельности Андрея Шевченко были положительными. Я не слышал негативных отзывов. Главному тренеру дали время после завершения отборочного цикла, чтобы наработать изменения в свою программу подготовки, учитывая выступления в отборе на ЧМ-2018 , - сказал Записоцкий во время встречи с прессой.

posts.title: ঝিনাইদহে শতাধিক হাইড্রোলিক হর্ন জব্দ
posts.text:
ঝিনাইদহে শতাধিক হাইড্রোলিক হর্ন জব্দ ঝিনাইদহ প্রতিনিধি,   15:20:51.0   15:21:17.0 BdST গাড়ির নিষিদ্ধ হাইড্রোলিক হর্ন সারাদেশে বন্ধে উচ্চ আদালতের নির্দেশ আসার পর ঝিনাইদহে বিভিন্ন যানবাহন থেকে এ ধরনের শতাধিক হর্ন জব্দ করা হয়েছে। 
মঙ্গলবার সকাল থেকে দুপুর পর্যন্ত জেলা শহরের বিভিন্ন মোড়ে এ অভিযান চালানো হয় বলে জেলা ট্রাফিক পুলিশ পরিদর্শক কৃষ্ণ পদ সরকার জানান। 
তিনি বলেন, গত রোববার সারাদেশে যানবাহনে হাইড্রোলিক হর্ন ব্যবহার বন্ধের নির্দেশ দেয় হাইকোর্ট। 
“এ নির্দেশের পর শহরের বিভিন্ন স্থানে চেক পোস্ট বসিয়ে বাস, ট্রাক ও পিকআপ ভ্যান থেকে শতাধিক হাইড্রোলিক হর্ন অপসারণ করে জব্দ করা হয়েছে।” 
এরপর কোনো যানবাহনে হাইড্রোলিক হর্ন পাওয়া গেলে তাদের বিরুদ্ধে আইনগত ব্যবস্থা গ্রহণ করা হবে জানান তিনি। আরও খবর জানতে ক্লিক করুন : বিজ্ঞাপন আরও পড়ুন

thread.title: На Оболони внедорожник протаранил маршрутку: Пять человек пострадали

posts.title: На Оболони внедорожник протаранил маршрутку: Пять человек пострадали
posts.text:
На Оболони внедорожник протаранил маршрутку: Пять человек пострадали  34 В Оболонском районе Киева произошло ДТП с участием маршрутного микроавтобуса и внедорожника 
Авария произошла на ул. Героев Днепра, передает " ДС " со ссылкой на "Эспрессо ". 
Как рассказали полицейские, микроавтобус Mercedes перевозил пассажиров на въезде в Киев. Нарушение правил дорожного движения, он повернул на улицу Героев Днепра и при этом не пропустил внедорожник Volvo. 
Сам водитель маршрутки говорит, что перед ним ехала еще одна маршрутка. Последняя успела проскочить, а у него на бешеной скорости влетел Volvo. 
По словам свидетелей, в больницу забрали пять пассажиров с травмами различной степени тяжести.

Originally Posted by Hyrja Does anyone remember when we got Legion Alpha? I remember Ion saying it would come a couple of weeks after Blizzcon. It was short off the heels of BlizzCon, but it was also an abnormally long alpha. Especially contrasted to the WOD alpha which lasted, what? 20 days? There isn't exactly a consistent trend to work with here.
Also, crucially, we didn't get Legion announced at that BlizzCon. It had already been announced months before. So, we shouldn't expect it to follow a similar model.

新聞分享 迎接新的一年到來，中視主播群哈遠儀、蕭惠文、侯乃榕、方彥迪、李佳玲、林慧蓉、鍾季容7人，難得聚集在一起，原來是為了新年度記事本製作，因而放下手邊工作，並陸續換上華麗、休閒、居家、時尚等風貌的服裝，站在鏡頭前大玩變裝秀，讓人看到他們主播台下的清新樣貌。
拍攝當天7位主播難得聚集在攝影棚，一起討論當天的流程外，拍攝空檔時間，主播們不僅坐在一起用餐，甚至還用手機記錄當天變裝造型，輕鬆逗趣的氛圍，更是平常在主播室裡看不到的現象。為了這次拍攝，每位主播也絞盡腦汁，裝扮出最適合自己角色的造型。
當家主播哈遠儀為了這次拍照特地裝扮成文青，她笑說，自己沒有那麼常旅行，也沒有帶小孩，平常工作太忙，在家也沒有煮飯，扮成文青主要是跟自己的穿著很像，但最重要就是準備道具簡單，不需要花太多時間。
方彥迪喜摩登造型
蕭惠文因為愛乾淨，所以把自己裝扮成家政婦，工作上雖然忙，但愛乾淨的毛病，讓她即使回到家也不得閒，她表示，自己最棘手的家事就是做菜，好不容易把家裡打掃乾淨，但煮菜時油煙一多，看不下去就得再打掃一次。為了對抗油煙，她最常做的就是湯，「不要花太多時間，但又能把所有營養食材放進去，若想吃好一點，就買一些現成的食材回來加料。」
侯乃榕私底下喜歡不拘束感覺，穿衣風格偏好休閒風，把自己裝扮成旅行的樣子再貼切不過！這次特別以褲裝為主，「就是有帶小孩媽媽的寫照」，她表示，小孩現在2歲，每次全家出遊旅行，雖然已經盡量很精簡行李，但東西就是一大包，不能像單身時那麼輕鬆，這次拍攝特地挑選休閒褲裝，最適合傳達生小孩後當媽的心情。
方彥迪裝扮成時尚辣媽，是她的期望，當了媽之後，私下的裝扮只能以「頹廢」來形容，為了拍照一身摩登造型，她希望這次拍完照後能夠「美夢成真」，讓自己以後帶小孩也能很時尚。
哈遠儀再力拚做人
李佳玲以party為概念，一襲性感裝扮，令人眼睛為之一亮。她表示，自己很少穿性感的衣服，每次參加派對光搞定衣服就是一件難事！因此，只要參加派對，她最愛一件式長洋裝，最好能遮住腳，不用穿高跟鞋，「若可以最好是可以穿球鞋、牛仔褲去參加派對！」
林慧蓉裝扮甜美風貌，直呼，「一點也不像自己！」每天在主播台上報新聞，給予人形象都是穩重、專業的一面，私下個性其實很像小孩，她表示，這回拍攝很有趣，剛好可以把內心另外一面表現出來，於是就選了最不像自己的甜美造型。
鍾季容換上一身甜美小洋裝裝扮，化身為韓語老師，她笑說，「自己因為工作關係，才開始學韓文。」這次拍照在想主題，大家叫她不如裝扮成韓語老師，為了呈現拍攝效果，她還特地寫了韓語小卡片，展現自己的韓語實力。
此外，主播們也大方享自己今年表現以及新年度展望，哈遠儀透露，新的一年除了要將節目《改變的起點》集結成冊，打算在明年出一本書，接著再和老公力拚「做人」，她也提醒想懷孕的女性朋友們，盡量找專業的醫師協助調理身體，不要輕易相信偏方。哈遠儀說若兩項都達成，就等於是「一年生兩胎」。
▲迎接新的一年到來，中視主播群大玩變裝秀。（圖／時報周刊，2016.12.30）
李佳玲婚後過更爽
李佳玲今年6月才結婚，隨即被問到婚姻生活？她脫口：「不會啊，結婚後過得更爽。」自曝婚後體重沒變，體脂肪卻飆破標準值；不僅如此，她也透露家事幾乎都由老公一手包辦，在家的功用只剩下按洗衣機「啟動」鈕的功能。而對於懷孕生子，李佳玲表示不急，還要多享受一下兩人世界。
男主播陳志耕明年將化身「科男」，跨領域主持科學小品節目，把看似深奧的科學知識融入生活，他舉例曾「徒手切蘋果」，強調找對施力點，靠一根手指頭就能將蘋果切成兩半，就在陳志耕認真解說訣竅時，現場有人提問：「那鳳梨可以嗎？」沒想到他竟認真回答：「基本上是不建議。」
林慧蓉和鍾季容兩位則屬於半夜留守公司的類型，林慧蓉苦笑說：「現在就是跟工作談戀愛，常常晚上11點下班，多留在公司的時間就是自己在練功。」形容有時工作太忙碌，像是嫁給了工作。

迎接新的一年到來，中視主播群哈遠儀、蕭惠文、侯乃榕、方彥迪、李佳玲、林慧蓉、鍾季容7人，難得聚集在一起，原來是為了新年度記事本製作，因而放下手邊工作，並陸續換上華麗、休閒、居家、時尚等風貌的服裝，站在鏡頭前大玩變裝秀，讓人看到他們主播台下的清新樣貌。
拍攝當天7位主播難得聚集在攝影棚，一起討論當天的流程外，拍攝空檔時間，主播們不僅坐在一起用餐，甚至還用手機記錄當天變裝造型，輕鬆逗趣的氛圍，更是平常在主播室裡看不到的現象。為了這次拍攝，每位主播也絞盡腦汁，裝扮出最適合自己角色的造型。
當家主播哈遠儀為了這次拍照特地裝扮成文青，她笑說，自己沒有那麼常旅行，也沒有帶小孩，平常工作太忙，在家也沒有煮飯，扮成文青主要是跟自己的穿著很像，但最重要就是準備道具簡單，不需要花太多時間。
方彥迪喜摩登造型
蕭惠文因為愛乾淨，所以把自己裝扮成家政婦，工作上雖然忙，但愛乾淨的毛病，讓她即使回到家也不得閒，她表示，自己最棘手的家事就是做菜，好不容易把家裡打掃乾淨，但煮菜時油煙一多，看不下去就得再打掃一次。為了對抗油煙，她最常做的就是湯，「不要花太多時間，但又能把所有營養食材放進去，若想吃好一點，就買一些現成的食材回來加料。」
侯乃榕私底下喜歡不拘束感覺，穿衣風格偏好休閒風，把自己裝扮成旅行的樣子再貼切不過！這次特別以褲裝為主，「就是有帶小孩媽媽的寫照」，她表示，小孩現在2歲，每次全家出遊旅行，雖然已經盡量很精簡行李，但東西就是一大包，不能像單身時那麼輕鬆，這次拍攝特地挑選休閒褲裝，最適合傳達生小孩後當媽的心情。
方彥迪裝扮成時尚辣媽，是她的期望，當了媽之後，私下的裝扮只能以「頹廢」來形容，為了拍照一身摩登造型，她希望這次拍完照後能夠「美夢成真」，讓自己以後帶小孩也能很時尚。
哈遠儀再力拚做人
李佳玲以party為概念，一襲性感裝扮，令人眼睛為之一亮。她表示，自己很少穿性感的衣服，每次參加派對光搞定衣服就是一件難事！因此，只要參加派對，她最愛一件式長洋裝，最好能遮住腳，不用穿高跟鞋，「若可以最好是可以穿球鞋、牛仔褲去參加派對！」
林慧蓉裝扮甜美風貌，直呼，「一點也不像自己！」每天在主播台上報新聞，給予人形象都是穩重、專業的一面，私下個性其實很像小孩，她表示，這回拍攝很有趣，剛好可以把內心另外一面表現出來，於是就選了最不像自己的甜美造型。
鍾季容換上一身甜美小洋裝裝扮，化身為韓語老師，她笑說，「自己因為工作關係，才開始學韓文。」這次拍照在想主題，大家叫她不如裝扮成韓語老師，為了呈現拍攝效果，她還特地寫了韓語小卡片，展現自己的韓語實力。
此外，主播們也大方享自己今年表現以及新年度展望，哈遠儀透露，新的一年除了要將節目《改變的起點》集結成冊，打算在明年出一本書，接著再和老公力拚「做人」，她也提醒想懷孕的女性朋友們，盡量找專業的醫師協助調理身體，不要輕易相信偏方。哈遠儀說若兩項都達成，就等於是「一年生兩胎」。
▲迎接新的一年到來，中視主播群大玩變裝秀。（圖／時報周刊，2016.12.30）
李佳玲婚後過更爽
李佳玲今年6月才結婚，隨即被問到婚姻生活？她脫口：「不會啊，結婚後過得更爽。」自曝婚後體重沒變，體脂肪卻飆破標準值；不僅如此，她也透露家事幾乎都由老公一手包辦，在家的功用只剩下按洗衣機「啟動」鈕的功能。而對於懷孕生子，李佳玲表示不急，還要多享受一下兩人世界。
男主播陳志耕明年將化身「科男」，跨領域主持科學小品節目，把看似深奧的科學知識融入生活，他舉例曾「徒手切蘋果」，強調找對施力點，靠一根手指頭就能將蘋果切成兩半，就在陳志耕認真解說訣竅時，現場有人提問：「那鳳梨可以嗎？」沒想到他竟認真回答：「基本上是不建議。」
林慧蓉和鍾季容兩位則屬於半夜留守公司的類型，林慧蓉苦笑說：「現在就是跟工作談戀愛，常常晚上11點下班，多留在公司的時間就是自己在練功。」形容有時工作太忙碌，像是嫁給了工作。

posts.author: julieandherlife
posts.text:
Nezáujem, rezignácia, únava.
Dni sú ťažšie, smutnejšie.
Neviem, čím to je. V pondelok ráno som sa zobudila s úsmevom na tvári. A potom, odrazu.
Nepodarený test, dlhý deň, drahý obed, kamarátka v nemocnici, ticho, spánok. O 5 hodín zvoní budík. Alebo o 4?
Ťažké viečka, boľavá hlava, málo kávy (áno, to by bol obrovský problém mojej osobnosti, nebanalizuj), nezáživná prednáška z Dejín Európy a zistenie, že nebudem môcť vyventilovať celý svoj život na plese. Swing si snáď niekde nájdem. A opäť pretancujem celú noc. Aj keby som mala byť sama.
Samota môže byť v podstate celkom fajn.
Prídeš na to, čo je v tvojom živote skutočne dôležité.
Možno by som potrebovala byť sama.
Avšak nechcem.
Prichádzam na to, že mám okolo seba úžasných ľudí.
Práve kvôli nim nechcem byť sama.

posts.title: Evesham man jailed following "acid" attack outside pub
posts.text:
A LABOURER from Evesham has been jailed for a roadside "acid" attack after squirting a bottle of cleaning solution at two men. 
Max Kelly was a passenger in a BMW being driven by his friend when a confrontation took place with the victims, who had been sitting with a drink outside a pub. 
Kelly shouted "I've got acid" at the men, before spraying the liquid. 
Jailing him for the "very serious crimes", chairman of magistrates Ann Brown told him his actions could not "be taken for granted". 
One victim, David Hobson, an off-duty firefighter, described it smelling like "ammonia" and desperately tried to clean the liquid off during the incident on July 18. 
The other man, Robert Robinson, stripped off in the street after being hit, such was his fear of injury after a spate of well-publicised attacks across the UK. 
The confrontation was sparked after Mr Robinson watched the BMW being driven erratically around the narrow streets of a residential area in Dickens Heath, Solihull, near Birmingham. 
When Mr Robinson told the driver to slow down, the car stopped and Kelly got out asking him: "What did you say?" 
As the 23-year-old, formerly of Smiths Wood, West Midlands, but now of Evesham, got out of the car, he said "I've got acid" and sprayed it on the two men. 
Kelly, a father-of-one expecting his second child, claimed he never used those words but he was found guilty of two counts of common assault at an earlier trial. 
Jailing Kelly at Birmingham Magistrates' Court on Monday, Mrs Brown told him he had shown little remorse, adding: "You don't appear to have taken responsibility." 
Kelly, who had previous convictions for criminal damage and had just served a suspended sentence at the time of the attack for having a weapon on another occasion, replied: "I understand." 
Mrs Brown told him: "The fear and distress you put your victims to cannot be taken for granted. They believed they'd been sprayed with acid." 
He was sentenced to six months in jail for each attack, to run concurrently, and ordered to pay both men £500 compensation. 
The car's driver, Benjamin Prentice, of Hexton Close, Solihull, was fined £140 at an earlier hearing after admitting a public order offence in connection with the incident.

thread.title: Stephen Colbert and Trevor Noah shake their heads over Japan's one-sided Trump charm offensive
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert and Trevor Noah shake their heads over Japan's one-sided Trump charm offensive

posts.title: Stephen Colbert and Trevor Noah shake their heads over Japan's one-sided Trump charm offensive
posts.text:
Stephen Colbert and Trevor Noah shake their heads over Japan's one-sided Trump charm offensive 4:42 a.m. ET 
President Trump "is on a 13-day trip through Asia — Fox & Friends has one less viewer," Stephen Colbert said on Monday's Late Show . But Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has gone out of his way to claim Trump as a friend, treating him to matching Trump-inspired baseball hats, feeding koi with him, and hosting him for a round of golf. "All right, Shinzo, leave a few of the strokes on the golf course," Colbert said, after playing Abe's post-golf remarks. Trump, for his part, wanted to know why "a country of samurai warriors" like Japan did not shoot down North Korean missiles flying over head, Colbert noted, wryly suggesting some other Japanese characters who might be better suited for the job. 
"I don't know what's worse — that Trump still thinks Japan has samurai, or that he thinks samurai warriors were trained in missile defense," Trevor Noah sighed on The Daily Show . "Poor Japan, man. Once again they have to deal with an out-of-control monster with tiny hands." Noah explained why Japan needs Trump, had a chuckle at the matching hats, compared Trump to a tourist who only eats at McDonald's, and grimaced at Trump's comments about dominating Japan economically. "You know, someone should tell Donald Trump to always stop speaking after his first sentence, because every time, that's where it goes wrong," he said, with examples. 
But this is a 13-day trip, Noah said, and now Trump "heads to South Korea, where he will probably shove chopsticks up his nose and pretend that he's a walrus." 
While Trump is still in Japan, The Late Show dipped into Japanese exports, too, with a short cartoon about Trump vs. Pokemon. You can watch that below. Peter Weber

posts.title: Gritos de "¡Fascistas!" en el pueblo de Puigdemont a 'El programa de Ana Rosa'
posts.text:
Gritos de "¡Fascistas!" en el pueblo de Puigdemont a 'El programa de Ana Rosa' El equipo del programa se desplazó a Amer para hablar con los vecinos pero no tuvo éxito IDEAL GENTE Martes, 7 noviembre 2017, 09:52 
Después de que el juez belga decidiera dejar en libertad condicional a Carles Puigdemont, el equipo de 'El programa de Ana Rosa' visitaba Amer, pueblo del expresident de la Generalitat . 
En ese reportaje, intentaron hablar con los hermanos de Carles Puigdemont, aunque no recibían más que negativas por su parte. Más tarde quisieron hacerlo con con los vecinos del pueblo. Como mucho obtuvieron esta respueta: "Es un pueblo pequeño, la gente tenemos un respeto, es que así es como debe ser" . 
Para finalizar el paseo por el pueblo, y uno de los vecinos se encaró con el equipo de grabación, llegando a llamarles "Hijos de puta" . La reportera preguntó al autor de los gritos para asegurarse y el respondió con un "¡Fascistas!". Temas

thread.title: 4 common myths about heartburn | Health24
thread.title_full: 4 common myths about heartburn | Health24

posts.author: Carine Visagie
posts.title: 4 common myths about heartburn | Health24
posts.text:
07 November 2017 4 common myths about heartburn Don’t let these common myths stand in the way of getting your heartburn under control. There are a number of myths and misconceptions about heartburn. ~ 
Myth #1: Heartburn isn’t a big deal 
Occassional, mild heartburn probably isn’t worth worrying about. But frequent heartburn certainly is. Heartburn can affect your quality of life – you may struggle to sleep, find it difficult to work the next day, no longer enjoy certain foods, and experience severe pain and discomfort. 
Frequent heartburn may also be an indication of gastro-oesophageal reflux disease (GORD). GORD, in turn, increases your risk for Barrett’s oesophagus, a condition marked by a change in the appearance of the cells in the oesophagus. In some people, this eventually develops into cancer of the oesophagus – a life-threatening condition. 
Left untreated, heartburn may also contribute to infections of the upper respiratory tract. 
Myth # 2: Heartburn is always linked to what you eat and drink 
While it’s true that rich, spicy foods, onions, garlic, alcohol and coffee may cause heartburn in some of us, there may be other underlying causes. 
Heartburn and GORD may occur because the lower oesophageal sphincter (LES), the valve-like structure between the oesophagus and the stomach, relaxes more often than it should, or at the wrong time. Hiatal hernia, where a part of the stomach protrudes through a small opening (a hiatus) in the diaphragm, may be another cause. 
In some people, food remains in the stomach for an abnormally long time as a result of autonomic nerve damage. And, in others, the salivary and mucus-generating glands in the digestive system don’t work as they should, which may contribute to heartburn. 
If heartburn is affecting your quality of life, it’s best to get it checked out by a doctor. 
Myth #3: Smoking helps to relieve heartburn 
No, the opposite is true. The more you smoke , or the more you’re exposed to second-hand smoke, the greater your risk for heartburn and GORD. 
Research shows that tobacco smoke increases stomach acid production, reduces the rate at which the stomach empties, decreases the pressure on the lower oesophageal sphincter (allowing stomach acid to flow back up into the oesophagus), promotes the movement of bile salts from the intestine into the stomach (making stomach acid more harmful), and injures the oesophagus (making it less able to resist damage from stomach acid). 
Smoking may also affect the medicine your doctor has prescribed for heartburn, making it less effective. 
Myth #4: Heartburn is a normal part of ageing 
While the prevalence of heartburn and GORD tends to increase with age, it doesn’t mean that it’s a normal part of ageing . In fact, people who experience heartburn in their 50s and 60s are more likely to present with serious complications, like erosive oesophagitis or Barrett’s oesophagus. 
What’s more, GORD symptoms may differ from those experienced by younger adults. While people in their 20s, 30s and 40s may experience heartburn and regurgitation, GORD symptoms in elderly people may include difficulty swallowing, vomiting, weight loss, chest pain, anaemia and anorexia. 
To complicate matters, age-related changes to the nervous system could mean that older adults get desensitised to the damage that occurs in the oesophagus – in other words, you may reflux regularly, but simply not be aware of it. 
Talk to your doctor if you experience any of the signs or symptoms described above. 
Image credit: iStock

thread.title: Jut en J(u)ul op de Boekenbeurs Antwerpen
thread.title_full: Jut en J(u)ul op de Boekenbeurs Antwerpen

posts.author: Thrillerlezers (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Jut en J(u)ul op de Boekenbeurs Antwerpen
posts.text:
De dag eindigde met de vraag: als je moet kiezen wie zou je dan doen Saskia Noort of Aspe? Beiden kozen we voor Saskia Noort. Mensen die mij al een beetje langer kennen, vragen ze nu af wat er in godsnaam met Aspe is. Daar Aspe ook bijna de laatste persoon was die we op de Antwerpse beurs zagen, gaan we eerst bij het begin starten. 

Het allereerste begin was dat Juul en ik elkaar in Roosendaal troffen en we vanaf dat moment geen stilte gevallen is tot ik weer in de trein naar Breda stapte.
Juul is een duracellkonijntje met een arsenaal aan spontane opmerkingen wat vaak ontwapend werkt en tot leuke gesprekken met de aanwezigen op de beurs leidt. Bovendien was het voor mij zo verfrissend om voor het eerst niet met een stel schaduwen rond te lopen. Mensen die op een paar meter afstand wachten tot je iemand aanspreekt en als het een leuk gesprek is er snel bij komen staan. En dan nog tot niks komen als de vraag of het boek gesigneerd mag. Fantastisch om net zo'n enthousiast iemand mee te hebben.
Leuk was ook te horen dat men vond dat het goed is dat Thrillerlezers weer gewoon lekker mijn blog is en het plezier  volledig terug is na tien maanden zwoegen, twijfelen en willen stoppen. Hoe gaaf de waardering te horen van auteurs die je aanspreken op wat je doet voor hen. Nice en megachill. 


Na jassen en rugzak in een lockertje gepropt te hebben en wij twee best openminded niet wetend hoe we degene van de kaartcontrole moesten aanspreken, neem ik Juul mee de eerste hal in. Juul was de OV specialist op Antwerpen , want ik kon niks vinden. De tram vindt je onder het bordje metro metro en is ondergronds en ook boven. Kaartje kopen voor de Tram?? Boven in de stationshal niet, lange gangen door en ook niet.  Ik was blij met Juul. Die vond alles, terwijl ik nog verdwaasd rond keek. 

Eerst even Hilde Vandermeeren feliciteren met het winnen van de Hercule Poirotprijs. Helemaal blij is ze met de prijs. Leuk te zien. Eneuk mens sws en een paar toffe boeken heeft ze gemaakt. Het werd tijd voor  zowel haar als winnaar en zeker eens een vrouwelijke auteur. 

Toen richting Nicolas Sparks. Een vriendin vroeg of ik een boek wilde laten signeren. We komen echt net te laat aan, maar hij staat er nog. Maar bij zeer bekende auteurs lopen er vaak mensen van de uitgeverij rondom te zenuwen. Dus die meldde ons later terug te komen. Bij dat later stond er zo'n giga rij net opvallend veel hele jonge meiden dat we de moed snel weg voelden zakken.
Daar op het zelfde moment iemand in een andere hal ging signeren, die in de top 3 van mensen stond die we zeker wilden spreken, besloten we daarheen te 
spurten. Rick de Leeuw, jeugdsentiment van de Trockener kecks, die zich erg op Vlaanderen richt. Een man die de tand des tijds goed doorstaat..wat ik zeg: lekker ding. Ja, dat zeg ik. Er ontstaat een zeer enthousiast gesprek waarin hij zo verteld over een fenomeen in België dat ik besluit het erg mooi uitgevoerde boek meeneem. Zelden zijn boeken zo mooi gebonden op dik papier en mooie uitvlakken enz enz. Terwijl Rick over de veranderingen in deze tijd vertelt, hoor ik Juul alleen maar zuchtend verkondigen dat ze aan Ricks lippen hangt. Dat we bij het weggaan allebei een zoen krijgen, zorgt er voor dat Juul huppelend over de vloer loopt. Wij als twee pubers lyrisch over hoe leuk en charmant hij is. Oh h i Rick, als hij de 
bocht om komt.
We zijn bij zoveel leuke mensen wezen kletsen. Mensen die je alleen van Facebook eerst kende of mensen die je na lange tijd terug zag. Sterre Carron die als openingsvraag aan Juul vraagt waar ik ben. Nog steeds snappen we niet hoe ze de combie maakte dat wij samen zouden zijn. Dikke knuffel en veel te veel om te vertellen daar op die beurs. Dus snel een keer bijbeppen buiten de beurs. 
Ria Maes zagen we al vroeg in de middag, die samen met Aaron Wade het boek Pan schreef. Aron is in Vlaanderen bekend om een jeugdserie en moet regelmatig op de foto. Juul en Ria raken in gesprek over wielrennen en er vallen namen waar ik nog nooit van hoorde.
Oh wacht, ik had dezelfde vriendin beloofd ook een gesigneerd boek van Tess Gerritsen te regelen.  Wij op naar stand 400 zoveel. Oh Nee, weer een giga mega rij. Laat ik maar naar de auteurs van WPG gaan: de altijd vriendelijke Toni Coppers is een jaarlijks terugkomend persoon voor een  kletspraatje. Over zijn mooie omslag van De zaak Margritte. Ik ben omslagfreak en hij was me gelijk opgevallen. Naast hem zit Jan van der Cruysse en met beide heren ontstaat een geanimeerd gesprek.  Over de Thrillerprijzen die weg zijn of hoe ze uitgereikt werden ( gouden strop op tv). Ook even kennismaken met Koen Strobbe wiens De wolf van Colombes ik momenteel lees. Tof boek en ga zeker ook eerder werk eens lezen. 

En dan wandelen we naar de tweede muzikant van de dag: Candy Dulfer. Er 
bestaat een foto van Candy en mij op 14 jarige leeftijd en intussen is de dame de hele wereld drie keer rrond geweest. Spontaan vrolijk mens ook weer. De tussentijd zien we een mega rij groeien .. wie zit daar dan? Wat? Al die mensen zijn voor Griet op de Beeck. De schrijfster waar ik vorige week gewoon naar toe kon lopen en een praatje maakte. Een uur in de rij. Alleen voor  Griet doe ik dat..eenmalig. Het is zo'n moment dat ik me afvraag waarom ik een gesigneerd boek wil? Maar voor ons staat twee Vlaamse boekenland en we vullen de tijd met kletsen tot wij mogen.  Juul heeft de beste openingszin ever : nl dat ze het nieuwe boek niet goed vindt. hhhh...mag ik nu in een gat in de grond wegzakken haha. Tommy Wieringa die er naast zit , mompelt iets van zo dan weet je dat ook. En kijk eens wat Juul verder doet of zegt... die redde de situatie toch nog redelijk. 

Weglopend bespreken we Juuls actie en kan ik er alleen nog hard om lachen . We lopen langs Tess die in haar uppie staat en dat vergeleken met 3 uur eerder, kan ik nauwelijks geloven dat het echt Tess is. Hopla gesigneerd boek voor de vriendin gescoord. Twee uit drie is best een mooie score. Juul moet nog bij de famous Aspe langs. Heeft echter geen benul hoe de man er uit ziet. Tenminste dat bleek, toen ze bij Aspe aan de balie ging staan en zei dat er geen naambordje stond. De man zat naast een giga stapel van zijn nieuwste boek even erbij vermelden. Hij keek alsof hij water zag branden. Het kwam niet meer goed tussen de twee... Ik heb zelden zo'n gezicht gezien bij signeren. Kan er nu nog hard om lachen.
Never a full moment met Da Juulster! 
Langzaamaan loopt de boekenbeurs ten einde en proppen we ons tussen heel veel mensen in de tram. Als de zogenaamde haringen.. 

In Antwerpen heet de halte bij het Centraal station niet zo, dus nadat wel heel veel mensen opeens uitstapten, begrepen we dat we de volgende halte maar ook er snel uitnoesten. Tassen met boeken hebben trouwens de gewoonte per uur zwaarder te voelen, heel bijzonder. Eindelijk ook maar eens wat eten en het werd een zowaar lekker orde kipburgermenu bij een niet de Mac. De dag doornemen toch bijna 2 uur later maar eens richting trein.  

Verwonderend over de 
rust in een groot station en daarna kwijlend kijkend hoe een prachtgebouw er uit ziet in donker met verlichting. Oeps trein net weg die 1 keer per uur gaat. Tijd voor Een dampende bak ( zoals Pjotr Vreeswijk het 75 keer benoemd in zijn boek) met hoogtepunten van de dag ophalen. We bleven Rick noemen... Maar bovenal voerde de boventoon dat we dit volgend jaar weer gaan doen. Relaxed, lol, niet stoppen met kletsen, alles gezien wat en wie we wilden en nog veel meer. Dat stoppen met praten lukte pas toen we elk een andere vervolgtrein moesten.  

Een jaarlijks Jut en Jul-uitje is geboren!

posts.text:
জাপানের বিপক্ষে ব্রাজিল দলে অনিশ্চিত কৌতিনিয়ো স্পোর্টস ডেস্ক,   15:18:05.0   15:18:05.0 BdST চোটের কারণে জাপানের বিপক্ষে ব্রাজিলের ফিলিপে কৌতিনিয়োর খেলার সম্ভাবনা নেই বললেই চলে। তবে চার দিন পর ইংল্যান্ডের বিপক্ষে লিভারপুলের এই মিডফিল্ডার খেলতে পারেন বলে জানিয়েছেন ব্রাজিল দলের চিকিৎসক। 
ঊরুর চোটের কারণে লিভারপুলের হয়ে গত তিন ম্যাচে খেলতে পারেননি কৌতিনিয়ো। তবে দুটি প্রীতি ম্যাচের জন্য যোগ দিয়েছেন জাতীয় দলে। 
আগামী শুক্রবার ফ্রান্সের লিলে জাপানের বিপক্ষে খেলবে ব্রাজিল। চার দিন পর ওয়েম্বলিতে স্বাগতিক ইংল্যান্ডের মুখোমুখি হবে তিতের দল। 
চিকিৎসক রদ্রিগো লাসমার সোমবার জানিয়েছেন, কৌতিনিয়ো এখনও বল নিয়ে অনুশীলন করেননি। 
“কৌতিনিয়ো বাঁ-ঊরুর অ্যাবডাক্টরে পেশির চোটে ভুগছে। সেরে ওঠার চূড়ান্ত ধাপে আছে সে। আমরা জানতাম যে সে পুরোপুরি ফিট নাও হতে পারে। কিন্তু আমরা চেয়েছি সেরে উঠার চূড়ান্ত ধাপটায় সে আমাদের সঙ্গে থাকুক।” 
“জাপানের বিপক্ষে তার খেলার সম্ভাবনা খুবই কম। তবে ইংল্যান্ডের বিপক্ষে তার খেলা নিশ্চিত করতে কাজ করছি আমরা।” ট্যাগ : বিজ্ঞাপন আরও পড়ুন

thread.title: Fall for retailers keeps FTSE 100 in check - MarketWatch
thread.title_full: Fall for retailers keeps FTSE 100 in check - MarketWatch

posts.author: Carla Mozee
posts.title: Fall for retailers keeps FTSE 100 in check - MarketWatch
posts.text:
Victor Reklaitis Markets writer 
U.K. blue-chip stocks closed lower Tuesday, pulling back from a record made in the prior session, as shares in retailers declined following downbeat industry sales figures. 
Security services firm G4S PLC’s shares was the FTSE 100’s biggest loser in the wake of its lowered guidance. 
What markets are doing: The FTSE 100 index UKX, -0.65% dropped 0.7% to end at 7,513.11, falling from Monday’s record finish at 7,562.28 . 
The pound GBPUSD, -0.1063% fetched $1.3141. That was down from $1.3171 on Monday, when the sterling climbed 0.7% against the dollar, according to FactSet data. 
What’s moving markets: Retail sales rose 0.2% in October, the slowest rate of growth since May, according to figures from the British Retail Consortium and KPMG. Retail stocks fell after the data, which KPMG said should cause concern ahead of the Christmas shopping season. 
“October marked yet another reversal of fortunes for retailers, reinforcing just how volatile consumer spend has been,” said Paul Martin, head of retail at KPMG, in a statement. 
“Despite the positive picture last month, these latest figures will be a real disappointment and not the start to the golden quarter retailers had hoped for,” he said. 
Meanwhile, energy stocks were up as oil prices traded around two-year highs. WTI CLZ7, -0.33% and Brent crude futures LCOF8, -0.78% , however, were taking a breather after they jumped more than 3% each on Tuesday. 
Investors are also keeping an eye on the pound, which as of Monday, had added roughly 0.9% in the prior two sessions, according to WSJ Market Data Group. One factor could be the Brexit negotiations, which are slated to restart this week. 
Stock movers: G4S shares GFS, -4.69% slid 4.7% after the world’s largest security provider said in a trading update that it expects full-year revenue growth of between 3% to 4%, compared with its August forecast for revenue growth in 2017 of 4% to 6%. 
Shares of retailers Marks & Spencer Group PLC MKS, -1.00% and Next PLC NXT, -1.09% fell 1% and 1.1%, respectively, after the industry sales report. Kingfisher PLC KGF, -2.87% lost 2.9%. 
Oil major BP PLC BP., +0.69% BP, -0.23% closed up 0.7%, while rival Royal Dutch Shell PLC RDSB, -0.12% RDS.B, -1.28% dipped 0.1% after an earlier gain evaporated. 
Sky PLC shares SKY, -1.01% finished down 1%. The move came after reports late Monday that 21st Century Fox Inc. FOXA, +2.99% FOX, +3.23% recently held talks to sell its 39% stake in the broadcaster to Walt Disney Co. DIS, +1.63% , along with other assets. 
Associated British Foods PLC ABF, -3.74% fell 3.7%, even as the company posted better-than-expected yearly pretax profit. ABF said its 2017 earnings were boosted by sales at its fashion retail business, Primark. 
Imperial Brands PLC IMB, +0.49% rose 0.5% after the tobacco giant said it plans a 10% rise in its final dividend and said its “growth brands” performed strongly during fiscal 2017. 
Economic data: House prices in the U.K. grew 4.5% on an annual basis in October, the fastest rate since January, according to a Halifax report released Tuesday. The average price of £225,826 is the highest on record, it said. 
“The fact that the supply of new homes and existing properties available for sale remains low, combined with historically low mortgage rates and a high employment rate, continues to support house prices and is likely to do so over the coming months,” said Russell Galley, managing director at Halifax Community Bank, in a statement. posts.title: (CAN-QC-Val-D’Or) Technicien(ne) de service sur la chaniter / Field Service Technician (Mining Equipment)
posts.text:
Sandvik, Inc. Technicien(ne) de service sur la chaniter / Field Service Technician (Mining Equipment) in Val-D’Or , Quebec 
Technicien(ne) de service sur la chaniter / Field Service Technician (Mining Equipment) 
Job overview 
Sandvik Mining & Rock Technology est à la recherche d'un(e) 
technicien(ne) de service sur la chantier (équipement d’exploitation minière) 
Adresse : Val-d’Or, QC 
Veuillez soumettre votre CV en français et en anglais pour ce poste. Merci. 
Sandvik Mining & Rock Technologyest l’un des principaux fournisseurs mondiaux d’équipement et d’outils, de services et de solutions techniques pour l’industrie minière et la construction. Notre offre couvre le forage de roches, le concassage de pierres, le chargement, le roulage et la manutention. 
Nous sommes à la recherche d’un technicien(ne) de service sur la chantier pour répondre aux demandes de nos clients à Val-d’Or et des environs. 
Principales responsabilités : 
Inspecter l’équipement de Sandvik Mining & Rock Technology pour s'assurer de son bon fonctionnement et déceler les défectuosités et les défaillances 
Voir à l'ajustement de l’équipement, réparer ou remplacer les composants ou les systèmes défectueux selon la portée du travail afin qu’ils soient conformes aux spécifications du fabricant 
Voir à la mise en service de nouveaux équipements 
Tester l’équipement réparé pour s'assurer de son bon fonctionnement 
Rédiger des relevés de temps, des rapports techniques, des rapports de défectuosités et des listes de pièces précis 
Rester au fait des développements de l’industrie en matière de service à la clientèle, de produits et de meilleures pratiques techniques 
Effectuer d'autres tâches assignées 
3 à 5 ans d'expérience avec de l’équipement d'exploitation minière 
Expérience antérieure sur de l’équipement de Sandvik Mining un atout 
Compétences élevées dans la lecture des schémas hydrauliques et électriques 
Aptitude manifeste à diagnostiquer et à résoudre les problèmes et à effectuer des réparations électriques et mécaniques sur de l’équipement d'exploitation minière 
Aptitudes à communiquer, tant à l’oral qu’à l’écrit 
Doit parler en français 
Capacité à parler en anglais, un atout 
Connaissances informatiques (Suite MS Office) 
Permis de conduire valide 
Doit être disposé à voyager au besoin 
Test de dépistage de la consommation de drogues et d'alcool obligatoire pour avoir accès au site minier 
Doit pouvoir travailler légalement au Canada 
Rémunération et avantages sociaux 
Sandvik offre un programme de rémunération et d'avantages sociaux concurrentiel et complet incluant un régime de retraite concurrentiel avec assurance maladie, assurance dentaire, assurance vie et assurance invalidité ainsi qu’un programme de perfectionnement et de formation. 
Pour postuler : 
Les candidats qualifiés doivent faire parvenir leur demande à www.sandvik.com/careerssous le poste technicien(ne) de service sur la chantier, n° 355731. Nous remercions à l'avance toutes les personnes qui poseront leur candidature. Nous ne communiquerons qu'avec les personnes convoquées à une entrevue. 
Sandvik est déterminée à favoriser un environnement de travail juste, équitable et accessible dans lequel tous les employés et les clients se sentent appréciés, respectés et appuyés. Nous nous efforçons de rassembler un effectif représentatif de la diversité des communautés dans lesquelles nous vivons et que nous servons, et où chaque employé a l’occasion d'atteindre son plein potentiel. 
Sandvik Mining & Rock Technology is seeking 
Field Service Technicians (Mining Equipment) 
Location: Val-d’Or, QC 
Please submit your resume (CV) in English and French in one application. Thank you. 
Sandvik Mining & Rock Technology is a leading global supplier of equipment and tools, service and technical solutions for the mining and construction industry. Our offering covers rock drilling, rock cutting, rock crushing, loading and hauling and materials handling. 
Sandvik is proud to offer competitive wages and benefits (that start upon hire) as well as participation in an excellent company pension plan. 
We are currently seeking one (1) Field Service Technicians to service our customers in Val-d’Or and surrounding area 
Key responsibilities include: 
Inspecting Sandvik Mining & Rock Technology equipment for proper performance and determining faults and malfunctions 
Adjusting equipment & repairing/replacing defective parts components or systems according to scope of work to restore equipment to original manufacture specifications 
Commissioning new equipment 
Testing repaired equipment to ensure proper operational performance. 
Completing accurate time records, technical reports, failure reports, and parts lists 
Staying current with industry, customer, product developments and technical best practices 
Performing other duties as assigned 
Your Profile 
3-5 years’ experience with mining equipment 
Previous experience with Sandvik Mining equipment would be considered an asset 
Excellent proficiency in reading hydraulic and electrical schematics 
Demonstrated ability to diagnose, troubleshoot and repair electrical and mechanical issues with mining equipment 
Strong written and verbal communication skills 
Bilingualism is an asset (English and French) 
Computer literacy (MS Office) 
Valid driver’s license is required 
Must be willing to travel as needed 
Mandatory drug and alcohol testing is a prerequisite for mine site access 
Must be legally eligible to work in Canada 
Compensation and Benefits 
Sandvik offers an excellent comprehensive compensation package including a pension plan with matching, competitive health, dental, life and disability benefits as well as ongoing development and training. 
How to Apply: 
Qualified candidates can apply at www.sandvik.com/careers to the Field Service Technician job opening # 355731. We thank all applicants. Only those considered for an interview will be contacted. 
Sandvik is committed to fostering an inclusive, equitable, and accessible environment where all employees and customers feel valued, respected, and supported. We are dedicated to building a workforce that reflects the diversity of the communities in which we live and serve, and where every worker has the opportunity to reach their full potential 
Deadline: 27 Nov

thread.title: Bu kahvehanede 5 yasak var: 4’ü Fenerbahçe’yle ilgili
thread.title_full: Bu kahvehanede 5 yasak var: 4’ü Fenerbahçe’yle ilgili

posts.title: Bu kahvehanede 5 yasak var: 4’ü Fenerbahçe’yle ilgili
posts.text:
ANASAYFA Spor Bu kahvehanede 5 yasak var: 4’ü Fenerbahçe’yle ilgili Bu kahvehanede 5 yasak var: 4’ü Fenerbahçe’yle ilgili 07.11.2017 - 09:36 VİDEO İZLE Manisa’da her yeri sarı kırmızı olan kahvehanenin 5 yasağı var. Bunlar ’Galatasaray’ı eleştirmek, Fener formasıyla girmek, Fener TV izlemek, Fenerbahçe’ye övgü dolu söz söylemek ve Fener maçlarını izlemek’. 
Manisa’nın Yunusemre ilçesine bağlı Yuntdağ bölgesindeki kırsal mahallelerden biri olan Osmancalı’da 27 yıl önce açılan Galatasaraylılar Kahvehanesinde tavandan tabana, duvardan camına, çay kaşığından bardağına kadar sarı kırmızı renkler hakim. 3 yıl önce Galatasaray Müze adını alan kahvehane tarafından bastırılan kartvizitte ise yer alan 5 kuraldan 4’ü ezeli rakipleri Fenerbahçe ile ilgili. Bütün takımlara kapılarının açık olduğunu belirten işletmeci Veli Turan, kahvehanede ezeli rakipleri Fenerbahçe’nin formasıyla girmenin, Fener TV’yi izlemenin, Fenerbahçe’ye övgü dolu söz söylemenin ve Fener maçlarını izlemenin yasak olduğunu belirterek, bu kuralların kartvizitte de yer aldığını söyledi. Babası Sadrettin Turan 24 Nisan 1990 tarihinde açılan kahvehanenin birkaç fotoğrafla başladığını ve zamanla müze gibi olunca adını Galatasaray Müze olarak değiştirdiklerini anlatan Veli Turan, “Osmancalı’da yaşayanların yüzde 98’i Galatasaraylı. Mahallemizde 750-800 civarında bir nüfus var” dedi.“AĞZINDAN FENER KELİMESİ ÇIKMADIĞI SÜRECE KAPIMIZ HERKESE AÇIK”Diğer takımlara karşı ellerinden geldiğince hoşgörülü davranmaya çalıştıklarını kaydeden Turan, dışarıdan gelenlerin ise kahvehaneyi gördüklerinde şaşırdıklarını söyledi. Müessesenin kuralları olduğunu dile getiren Turan, “Bunun için bir kartvizit bastırdık. Galatasaray’ı eleştirmek yasaktır, Fener formasıyla girmek yasaktır, Fener TV izlemek yasaktır, Fenerbahçe’ye övgü dolu söz söylemek yasaktır, Fener maçlarını izlemek yasaktır. Yani ağzından Fener kelimesi çıkmadığı sürece herkese kapımız açık. Sadece Fenerbahçelilere has bir durum bu, diğer kulüplerle kardeşiz” şeklinde konuştu.Kahvehanenin müşterilerinden biri olan Galatasaray taraftarı Ali Tarhan ise kahvehaneyi çok beğendiğini belirterek, Yuntdağı bölgesinde kahvehanenin eşi benzeri olmadığını söyledi.Kahvehanenin müşterilerinden biri olan ve bütün takımlara eşit sempati duyduğunu ve önceliğinin Manisaspor olduğunu kaydeden Hüseyin Ali Tarhan da, “Türkiye’de buranın eşi benzeri yok. Bırakın kahvehaneleri kulüpler de bile yok. Galatasaray kulübünde yok bu şekilde bir kahvehane. Kahveyi bırak müze oldu burası” dedi.(Sadık Cangel - Önder Aydın / İHA) (İHA)

posts.title: Участие Варана в матчах с Уэльсом и Германией под вопросом
posts.text:
Испания Франция Товарищеские матчи Участие Варана в матчах с Уэльсом и Германией под вопросом 
Защитник " Реала " Рафаэль Варан может пропустить два контрольных матча сборной Франции, несмотря на то что был вызван в национальную команду. Футболист недавно восстановился после травмы , но в минувшем туре Ла Лиги против "Лас-Пальмаса" (3:0) не играл. Наставник сборной Франции Дидье Дешам отметил, что не будет рисковать здоровьем Варана. 

"У него были небольшие проблемы неделю назад, в воскресенье Варан не играл. Посмотрим на Рафаэля в течение 72 часов и решим, использовать ли его в товарищеских матчах. Мы не будем рисковать", — цитирует Дешама Marca.

thread.title: A TRAVÉS DE LOS TIEMPOS
thread.title_full: A TRAVÉS DE LOS TIEMPOS

posts.author: hezerleid
posts.title: A TRAVÉS DE LOS TIEMPOS
posts.text:
He navegado en la armada invencible
he luchado contra el ejercito persa
he temido a la vida apacible
he vencido los designios del destino
ante un alma tangible…
en un cuerpo peregrino…
 
 
He ardido en Roma con las llamas de Nerón
he cantado cánticos gloriosos junto a Calígula
he dado discursos filosóficos junto a Platón
he desbancado a cierto emperador…
… solo con la valentía de ser en el coliseo…
… el mejor gladiador…
 
 
He luchado con fieras
he sido el mejor escriba
me he crecido entre faraones
Y no es que no te quiera…
… si no que lo que va no viene…
… y lo que vino ya se iba…
en el tiempo… y en los eones…
 
 
 
He parado a la propia muerte…
he sentido la agonía
en mis manos he derrochado la suerte…
… con poder y con cierta ironía…
 
 
He navegado el Nilo
con cleopatra he visto maravillas
he visto transformarse en Eva… una simple costilla
he dirigido ejércitos…
y he dormido junto a Sade en la Bastilla.
 
 
He retado en numerosas ocasiones a la burguesía
he acusado grandes señoríos
y pienso en ti… y no he dejado de hacerlo ni un solo día…
he sentido en el cuello… guillotinado, su metal frío.
 
 
Me he salvado de la santa Inquisición
no he temido a ninguna revolución
en el vaticano… no he encontrado la salvación…
ni en tu alma, ni en tus palabras… ese tan necesitado perdón…
 
 
He soñado con el poder
He celebrado incontables veces la victoria
he visto Troya arder
he pasado por este mundo sin pena ni gloria…
 
 
He sido viuda de un noble
fuerte como un roble…
princesa de un lejano reino
poeta en el romanticismo
pintora culmen del impresionismo
y hoy son canas lo que peino…
mientras mis pupilas siguen percibiendo lo mismo…
 
 
He inventado la pólvora…
quizá alguna que otra cosa más
te he deseado con frenesí
y no me digas que no…
Porque sabes bien… que yo siempre te diría que si…
 
 
Mil primaveras han pasado por mi retina
he visto marchitar millones de flores
y he llenado mi pecho de esos candores…
pero he sido esa persona que nunca atina…
 
 
Hoy llega mi final… tras haber visto tanto
y si se oye mi canto…
algo de experiencia aprendí…
… pero lo más importante…
no puedo vivir sin ti
y en mis mil vidas a veces triste a veces contento…
… te he guardado dentro en todo momento…
 
 
Con mi partida llega ya de todo… el final
pero en mis letras encontrarás la inmortalidad
pues te convertí en poesía…
… y ahora eres inmortal…
 
 
Concepción Cárceles Sirvent
+ Hezerleid +

posts.text:
இயலுமான நண்பர்கள் தாங்களும் பகிர்ந்து கொள்ளுங்கள்.
—– 
எனது சகோதரன் கோவிந்தன் கருணாநிதி அவர்களின் மரணம் குறித்தும் அவரது கடந்தகாலம் குறித்தும் எனது விடுதலை இயக்க போராட்ட காலத்தினை தொடர்புபடுத்தி தமது கற்பனைகயை கலந்து அரசியல் விமர்சனம் என்ற பெயரில் என்னை குறிவைத்து தாக்கியுள்ளார்கள்.நான் அடுத்த மாகாணசபைக்கு போட்டியிடக்கூடாது என்பதே இந்த சாராம்சமாகும்.
குறிப்பாக Battinaatham இணையத்தளமும் அதன் பின்னணியில் உள்ள சில அரசியல்வாதிகளும் அவர்களது சில ஆதரவாளர்களும் இந்த நடவடிக்கையின் சூத்திரதாரிகள் என்பது அனைவருக்கும் தெரிந்த பகிரங்க இரகசியம்.
எனது தம்பி ரெலோவில் இணைந்தது நான் ரெலோவில் இணைந்தது,இருவரும் கலந்துரையாடி கூடிகுலாவி நடந்தவிடயமல்ல எதேச்சயான விடயமாகும் .80 கால அரசியல் களநிலவரம்,விடுதலை எழுச்சியின் ஒரு அங்கமே இந்த விடயமாகுமே தவிர இது திட்டமிட்டு நடந்த நிகழ்வல்ல.
அதன் பின்னர் தமிழ் தேசிய விடுதலை இயக்கங்களுக்கிடையே உடன்பாடுகள்,முரண்பாடுகள்,இயக்களுக்கிடையிலான மோதல்கள்,இயக்க ஆதரவாளர்களை அடுத்தவர்கள் போட்டுத்தள்ளும் செயற்பாடுகள் எல்லாம்’ தமிழ் தேசிய விடுதலை போராட்டகாலத்தில் நடந்த சமகால நிகழ்வுகள்.இவையாவும் பகிரங்கமானதேயாகும்.இது ரெலோவுக்கு மட்டும் பொதுவானது அல்ல.தமிழ் தேசிய விடுதலைப்பரப்பில் இருந்த அனைத்து இயக்கங்களுக்கும் பொருந்தும்.
இது தொடர்பில் பின்னையகாலத்தில் சகல இயக்க தலைவர்களும் ( பிரபாகரன் உட்பட) கவலையடைந்ததும்,கவலை தெரிவித்ததும்,சில சமயங்களில் நேரடியாகவும் சில சமயங்களில் சூசமாகவும் தெரிவித்தமை கூட வரலாறுகளாகும்.
அக்காலத்தில் நான் கட்டளை தளபதியாகவும் எனது சகோதரன் என் அருகில் இருந்ததாகவும் நான் படுகொலை மனோவியாதியில் இருந்து போட்டுத்தள்ளும் உத்தரவை பிறப்பித்ததாகவும் அபாரமான கற்பனையை அந்த இணையத்தளமும் காட்சிப்படுத்தி காழ்ப்புணர்வினை வாந்தியெடுத்து மகிழ்ந்துள்ளது.
இந்திய இராணுவத்தின் காலம்,அதன் பின்னரான காலங்களில் இலங்கை இராணுவத்துடன் பல்வேறு விடுதலை இயக்கங்களில் இருந்து பிரிந்தவர்கள் குழுக்களாக இயங்கியமை கூட பகிரங்கமானதே.அந்த நடவடிக்கைகள் கூட தமிழ் தேசிய விடுதலை வரலாற்றில் விரும்பத்தகாத நடவடிக்கைகளாகவே நான் பார்க்கின்றேன்.
அவற்றிற்கும் எனக்கும் முடிச்சுப்போட்டு மகிழ்வதும் அவற்றிற்காக என்னைப்பழிவாங்குவதும் ஆடிக்கு ஒரு தரம் ஆவணிக்கு ஒருதரம் தமது இணையத்தளம் மூலமும் தமது முகநூல் மூலமும் பகிர்ந்து மகிழ்வதும் எனது மக்கள் செல்வாக்கு பற்றிய பயப்பிராந்தியின் வெளிபாடுகளே.
ஏனெனில் இவர்களின் கவலைகள் எல்லாம் எதிர்வரும் மாகாணசபை தேர்தலிலோ வேறு எந்த தேர்தல்களிலோ ஜனாவுக்கு நியமனம் வழங்கக்கூடாது என்பதாகும்.
எனது மக்கள் செல்வாக்கு,அரசியல் செயற்பாடு எனது அரசியலுக்கு அப்பாலான சமூகசேவை எல்லாம் இவர்களுக்கு அடிவயிறு கலக்கும் செயற்பாடுகளேயாகும்.இந்த இணையத்தளமும் அதன் பின்னணி அரசியல்வாதிகளும் என்னைக்குறிவைப்பது இது முதன்முறையல்ல.நான் தேர்தல்களில் போட்டியிடும்போதும் எனது வெற்றிவாய்ப்பு கைகூடும்போதும் இணையத்தளம் மூலமும் முகநூல் மூலமும் ஆரைப்பற்றை முதல் அம்பிளாந்துறை வரையில் நடைபெற்ற அனைத்து செயற்பாடுகளுக்கும் நான்தான் காரணம் என மறைந்திருந்து தாக்கி மகிழும் கீழ்த்தரமான அரசியல் விபச்சாரத்தனமான விமர்சனங்களை செய்வதையே வழக்கமாக கொண்டவர்கள்.இதுவே இவர்களது நடவடிக்கை.
மக்கள் இவர்களைவிட பண்பட்டவர்கள், பக்குவப்பட்டவர்கள், முதிர்ச்சியடைந்தவர்கள், அரசியல் தெரிந்தவர்கள். அரசியல்புரிந்தவர்கள். அதனால்தான் இவர்களது இத்தகைய கற்பனை கலந்த கீழ்தரமான விமர்சனங்களுக்கு மத்தியிலும் என்னை பாராளுமன்றத்திற்கும் பல வருடகால அரசியல் அஞ்ஞாத வாசத்திற்கு பின்னர் மாகாணசபைக்கும் மனமகிழ்ந்து தெரிவுசெய்தார்கள்.கடந்த பாராளுமன்ற தேர்தலில் கூட இவர்களது உள்குத்துவெட்டுகளே எனது வெற்றியை இறுதியில் பறித்தது.இதுகூட மட்டக்களப்பு மாவட்ட மக்கள் நன்கு அறிந்த வரலாறு.
அன்று நான் விடுதலை போராளியாக இருந்தபோதும் மக்கள் விரும்புக்குரிய போராளியாகவே இருந்தேன்.பாராளுமன்றம் கூட மக்கள் தெரிவிலேயே சென்றேன்.மாகாணசபைக்கு கூட மக்களே என்னை அனுப்பிவைத்தனர்.
ஒரு தடைவகூட தெரிவுசெய்யப்பட்ட உறுப்பினரை எனது செல்வாக்கினை பயன்படுத்தி பதவி விலகுமாறு பயன்முறுத்தியோ அச்சுறுத்தியோ அல்லது தெரிவுசெய்யப்பட்ட ஒரு உறுப்பினரை படுகொலைக்கு இரையாக்கி அவரின் குருதியில் பாதம் பதித்து பாராளுமன்றத்திற்கோ மாகாணசபைக்கோ நான் செல்லவில்லை என்பதை துணிவுடன் தலை நிமிர்ந்து கூறுகின்றேன்.
மக்கள் என்னை ஏற்கும் வரையில் எனது பணி தொடரும்.அதேபோல் மக்கள் என்னை புறக்கணித்த அன்றே அதையும் மகிழ்வுடன் ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளும் மனப்பக்குவம் எனக்குள்ளது.
நன்றி….ஐனா கருணாகரம்..
07.11.2017

posts.author: MCausevic
posts.title: OSCE Missions to Montenegro and Skopje support bilateral protocol on fighting human trafficking
posts.text:
OSCE Missions to Montenegro and Skopje support bilateral protocol on fighting human trafficking 7 November 2017 Multimedia 
The OSCE Mission to Montenegro, together with the OSCE Mission to Skopje, organized a first working meeting between the institutions of Montenegro and the Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia in charge of drafting a protocol on co-operation between the two countries in the fight against human trafficking. The meeting was held from 30 October to 1 November 2017 in Skopje. 
The meeting was attended by a Montenegrin delegation led by the head of the National Office and the National Coordinator for Combating Trafficking in Human Beings of Montenegro, Zoran Ulama, and a local delegation led by the National Co-ordinator and State Secretary of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, Magdalena Nestorovska. 
Participants worked on harmonizing the draft of the protocol, which aims to strengthen the two countries’ co-operation on such issues as identification, reporting, referral and voluntary return of victims and potential victims of trafficking. 
Montenegro has signed similar protocols with the Republic of Albania and Kosovo, and a similar agreement is planned with the Republic of Serbia. Contacts Senior Press and Public Information Assistant Head of Mission Office

thread.title: German Greens signal flexibility in coalition talks
thread.title_full: German Greens signal flexibility in coalition talks

posts.author: wtopstaff
posts.title: German Greens signal flexibility in coalition talks
posts.text:
Home » Latest News » World News » German Greens signal flexibility… German Greens signal flexibility in coalition talks By The Associated Press November 7, 2017 4:58 am 11/07/2017 04:58am Share German chancellor Angela Merkel, chairwoman of the Christian Democratic Union Party, (CDU) unpacks her documents at the begin of the meeting of her parliamentary group in Berlin, Germany, Monday, Nov. 6, 2017. (Michael Kappeler/dpa via AP) 
BERLIN (AP) — The leaders of Germany’s Green party are signaling that they may drop demands for a 2030 deadline to phase out combustion engines and shut coal-fired power stations as Chancellor Angela Merkel’s government-building efforts intensify. 
Merkel’s conservatives, the pro-business Free Democrats and the Greens want to determine by mid-November whether there’s enough common ground for full negotiations on a coalition never tried in national government. They struggled to bridge differences during initial talks. 
Greens co-leader Cem Ozdemir signaled in an interview with the daily Stuttgarter Zeitung published Tuesday that his party will soften its demand, much criticized by its prospective partners, to stop registering new cars with gas or diesel engines in 2030. 
“It is clear to me that we alone will not be able to push through the cutoff date of 2030 for the registration of fossil-fuel combustion engines,” he was quoted as saying — though “we must of course clear the way for emissions-free mobility with binding measures.” 
The party also has called for coal-fired electricity plants, currently a significant source of energy for Europe’s biggest economy, to be shut by 2030. But chairwoman Simone Peter told the Rheinische Post daily it is “pragmatic” on “whether the last coal-fired power station goes offline in 2030 or 2032,” and that the key is reducing carbon dioxide emissions. 
Germany, which is currently hosting a global conference on combating climate change, will miss its own emissions reduction targets unless further measures are taken, officials say. 
The Greens’ comments increase pressure on other parties to make concessions. There’s been little sign of movement so far, with Free Democrat leaders in particular saying they’re not afraid of new elections. 
Polls suggest a new vote wouldn’t create a parliament much different from the one elected in September. In that election, the nationalist and anti-immigration Alternative for Germany, or AfD, emerged as the third-biggest party. 
“We in AfD are not afraid — we would be very glad of new elections, because apparently none of the other parties is capable of fulfilling the task set by voters and forming a sensible governing coalition,” co-leader Alice Weidel said Tuesday.

thread.title: Александр ГОЛОВКО: "Мы больше не можем позволить себе терять очки"
thread.title_full: Александр ГОЛОВКО: "Мы больше не можем позволить себе терять очки"

posts.title: Александр ГОЛОВКО: "Мы больше не можем позволить себе терять очки"
posts.text:
Украина Чемпионаты Европы Александр ГОЛОВКО: "Мы больше не можем позволить себе терять очки" 
Главный тренер молодежной сборной команды Украины Александр Головко пообщался с масс-медиа накануне двух квалификационных матчей чемпионата Европы 2019 года. Напомним, что 10 ноября украинская "молодежка" сыграет на "Оболонь-Арене" в Киеве с Англией, а через четыре дня сборную ждет выезд в Шотландию. 

"У нас достаточно сложная группа, сразу 3-4 команды претендуют на выход в финальную часть Евро-2019. За первое место с Англией будет сложно бороться. А в текущий момент мы больше не можем позволить себе терять очки. Недостаток даже двух пунктов может стать угрозой для команды в этом отборе. 

Мы заканчиваем групповой турнир тремя домашними матчами, к тому же в конце нас ждет выезд в Нидерланды. В марте будет очень сложно противостоять англичанами, учитывая отсутствие достаточной игровой практики у наших ребят в зимние месяцы. Но это ключевые матчи, если мы хотим на что-то рассчитывать. 

Хорошо, что сейчас мы играем с Англией перед собственными трибунами. На 90% нам удалось собрать тех ребят, которым мы можем донести, чего ожидаем от них на поле в предстоящих матчах. Также приятным моментом является тактическая грамотность практически всех 11 футболистов, которые выйдут на поле в игре с Англией. 

Постараемся не давать сопернику выполнять навесные подачи, ограничим количество "стандартов" у наших ворот. Если мы будем фолить, играть с опозданием, давать подавать с флангов, тогда могут возникнуть проблемы. Нужно сыграть плотно и выйти на матч заряженными. В матче с Англией нужно уметь терпеть и ждать своего шанса. Умеют ли наши ребята играть без мяча и использовать малейший шанс - увидим. 

Смотрел матчи с участием шотландцев, в частности их домашнюю игру с Нидерландами. Там мяч фактически все время был в воздухе. Нам нужно будет положить его вниз и предложить тот футбол , в который хотим играть мы. 

Зинченко работает с первой командой " Манчестер Сити ", играл кубковую игру. Этого мало, но это лучше, чем не играть вовсе. Надеюсь, 60 минут он сможет провести на достойном уровне. У нас есть четыре дня, и мы вряд ли сможем повлиять на функциональное состояние команды. Поэтому на первый план выходят тактическое взаимодействие и грамотные замены - этим можно нивелировать проблемы функциональной готовности игроков. 

Наиболее проблемная позиция - центральный защитник, где выступают Лукьянчук и Зотько, которым не хватает конкуренции. Также есть серьезные опасения с позицией вратаря. Есть вопросы по Каневцеву, у которого повреждения спины. Безрук находится без практики в дубле " Черноморца ". Также есть вопрос с нападающими, и он не новый из-за ограниченного выбора исполнителей. 

В юношеском футболе ощущается дефицит талантливых игроков. Есть группа игроков 1996-1997 годов рождения. Участники чемпионата Европы среди команд U-17 и U-19. А потом 6-7 игроков сразу перешли в первую команду. С одной стороны, это хорошо, ведь мы работаем для того, чтобы обеспечивать национальную сборную качественными игроками. Впрочем, ребята должны понимать: чем больше в них таланта, тем выше с них спрос", - сказал Головко.

thread.title: Asian shares hit 10-year highs, oil slips after rally By Reuters
thread.title_full: Asian shares hit 10-year highs, oil slips after rally By Reuters

posts.title: Asian shares hit 10-year highs, oil slips after rally By Reuters
posts.text:
This article has already been saved in your Saved Items © Reuters. FILE PHOTO: An investor looks at an electronic screen at a brokerage house in Hangzhou 
By Lisa Twaronite 
TOKYO (Reuters) - Asian shares rallied to their highest in a decade and Japan's Nikkei climbed to its best close since 1992 on Tuesday, while oil prices held most of their gains a day after surging to more than two-year peaks on Saudi Arabia's anti-corruption purge. 
Futures hinted at solid openings for European bourses, with European stock futures ( STXEc1 ), Dax futures ( FDXc1 ) and FTSE futures ( FFIc1 ) and CAC futures ( FCEc1 ) each up 0.3 percent. 
MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan ( MIAPJ0000PUS ) extended early gains, rising 0.7 percent to its loftiest peak since November 2007. The index got a bump higher after all three major U.S. equity indexes closed at record highs overnight. 
Japan's Nikkei ( N225 ) reversed early losses and finished 1.7 percent higher, on expectations of strong earnings from Japanese companies. ( T ) 
"Foreign investors who were underweight on Japanese stocks in the summer are raising their investment stances to neutral and even overweight," said Norihiro Fujito, a senior investment strategist at Mitsubishi UFJ Morgan Stanley (NYSE: MS ) Securities. 
Australia's S&P/ASX 200 index ( AXJO ) jumped 1 percent to a nearly 10-year high, bolstered by strong commodities prices. 
Australia's central bank held rates at record lows for a 14th straight policy meeting on Tuesday as expected, and signaled it would stay sidelined for months to come amid stubbornly low inflation. 
U.S. crude ( CLc1 ) shed 11 cents to $57.24 after breaking above $56 a barrel for the first time in more than two years overnight. Brent crude futures ( LCOc1 ) were down 7 cents at $64.20. 
in Saudi Arabia, Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman's clampdown on graft led to arrests of royalty, ministers and investors, including prominent billionaire investor Alwaleed bin Talal. 
At present, analysts do not see Saudi Arabia, the world's largest oil exporter, changing its policy of supporting crude prices, but the crackdown has spurred concerns of Middle Eastern money pulling out of global financial markets 
"For now, concerns about the Saudi news do not appear to be weighing on U.S. shares, but if they do become a problem in the future, it could eventually have an impact on Japanese shares," Yutaka Miura, a senior technical analyst at Mizuho Securities in Tokyo. 
The dollar index , which tracks the greenback against a basket of six major currencies, added 0.1 percent to 94.847 ( DXY ). 
Against the yen, the dollar rose 0.4 percent to 114.12 but remained below its eight-month high of 114.737 marked in the previous session. 
The euro edged down 0.1 percent to $1.1597 . 
Lower U.S. yields have also weighed on the dollar, though they rose on Tuesday in line with buoyant equity markets. 
The benchmark 10-year yield ( US10YT=RR ) was at 2.328 percent in Asian trading compared to 2.320 percent, its U.S. close on Monday, when it plumbed its lowest levels in two weeks. It was at a seven-month high of 2.47 percent as recently as late October. [US/] 
The lack of clarity on the progress of U.S. tax reform as well as leadership at the U.S. central bank has clouded the dollar's outlook and kept it off its recent highs. 
Tax negotiators in the U.S. House of Representatives will seek to overcome their differences this week and work on a plan, aiming for their self-imposed deadline of passage this month. 
The Federal Reserve confirmed on Monday that influential monetary policymaker William Dudley plans to retire by mid-2018, leaving the leadership of the U.S. central bank unusually open. 
was down 0.2 percent at $1,278.65 per ounce after gaining nearly one percent in the previous session, easing in line with firmer Asian equities markets. [GOL/] Asian shares hit 10-year highs, oil slips after rally

posts.title: News outlet: Lebanon's outgoing PM leaves Saudi to visit UAE
posts.text:
0 
In this photo provided by the Saudi Press Agency, Saudi King Salman, right, meets with outgoing Lebanese Prime Minister Saad Hariri in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, Monday, Nov. 6, 2017. Hariri's resignation in a televised statement from Saudi Arabia on Saturday stunned Lebanon and plunged the tiny nation into uncertainty. In his resignation, Hariri accused Shiite power Iran of meddling in Arab affairs and the Iran-backed Lebanese militant Hezbollah group of holding Lebanon hostage. (Saudi Press Agency, via AP) HOGP 
In this photo provided by the Saudi Press Agency, Saudi King Salman, right, shakes hands with outgoing Lebanese Prime Minister Saad Hariri in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, Monday, Nov. 6, 2017. Hariri's resignation in a televised statement from Saudi Arabia on Saturday stunned Lebanon and plunged the tiny nation into uncertainty. In his resignation, Hariri accused Shiite power Iran of meddling in Arab affairs and the Iran-backed Lebanese militant Hezbollah group of holding Lebanon hostage. (Saudi Press Agency, via AP) HOGP 
BEIRUT (AP) — The TV station of Lebanon's resigned Prime Minister Saad Hariri says the politician has left the Saudi capital of Riyadh to travel to the United Arab Emirates where is he is scheduled to meet a top official. 
Hariri's departure comes after days of speculation in Lebanon that the Lebanese-Saudi politician is under house arrest in Saudi Arabia following his resignation over the weekend. 
The UAE and Saudi Arabia are strong allies and are spearheading an anti-Iran coalition in the region. 
Hariri's Future TV said the outgoing prime minister left Riyadh on Tuesday morning to UAE's capital Abu Dhabi to meet the powerful crown prince, Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan. 
Hariri unexpectedly announced his resignation Saturday during a trip to Saudi Arabia throwing Lebanon's fragile government into disarray.

thread.title: PUB SPY: The perfect spot for beer and burger lovers
thread.title_full: PUB SPY: The perfect spot for beer and burger lovers

posts.title: PUB SPY: The perfect spot for beer and burger lovers
posts.text:
18 comments 
I took my seat on a quiet Friday afternoon with a few people milling around and nobody else eating. The staff were very friendly, probably the nicest I’ve come across in Worcester. 
If beer is your bag, you’d be hard-pushed to find a better selection. The bar has more taps than B&Q and a fridge so anti-Brexit it’s pushing for a second referendum. 
Firefly offers a simple menu with variations on burgers and hot dogs all costing £7 each. Fries cost £4 and tacos – take your pick from steak carne asada, tempura seabass, mojo pork, crispy fried chicken and spicy bean – are three for £6. 
A burger is a simple thing but easy to get wrong. The burgers at Firefly tick a number of boxes for me in that they don’t feel the need to make them the size of a manhole cover and they’re not cramped with so many ingredients it becomes a mission to eat or worse, needing a knife and fork. 
With it being the week of Halloween, Firefly was offering a suitably themed burger as its sandwich of the week. 
My burger came filled with black pudding, which is always a welcome addition and was cooked to a nice medium. It was topped with crunchy pickled pumpkin coleslaw and a right hook of Sriracha mayo and pomegranate molasses hot sauce that hit the tonsils like a brand to cattle. 
A charred green chilli spiked into the top left a smoke trail behind the waiter like a priest carrying incense. 
The standard menu offers a fried fish sandwich, fried chicken sub, mojo pork sub, the ‘OG’ which is a classic burger and an halloumi and mushroom burger for the non-meat eaters. 
The ‘dirty fries’ came topped with brisket chilli smokier than a bonfire, a blanket of stretchy melted cheese that pulls like a bungee rope and fiery jalapenos. 
Other options include sweet potato fries with guacamole, Sriracha mayo and jalapenos or with mac and cheese, bacon and blue cheese crumb or halloumi fries with chilli jam. 
My hot dog was the size of a broom handle. It was crispy on the outside and snapped like a branch. It came topped with a crown of mac and cheese which was joyous – thick like tar and moreish, bacon saltier than a Tarantino script, a zig zag of Sriracha sauce and a dusting of blue cheese crumb, all held together in a soft white bun like a baseball mitt. 
Variations on the hot dog include the ‘classic’ with crispy beer onions, a ‘dirty dog’ with beef chilli, jalapenos and hot sauce, a mac and cheese and a Philly cheese steak. 
To drink, I was recommended a new triple hop Duvel which was obviously very hoppy but refreshing. Luckily it wasn’t as eye-wateringly acidic as the price. I’ll never be comfortable paying nearly the minimum wage for a bottle wherever I’m sat so at £6 a pop, it’s a bit of a wallet-buster. That’s not really a dig at Firefly, import beers are expensive country-wide but if you do want to quench your thirst with a couple, don’t expect much change. 
Nevertheless, the food and beer was excellent. It was my first time and with a menu that good, it won’t be my last.

thread.title: Democrats Try to Look Forward but Are Still Haunted by 2016 - The New York Times
thread.title_full: Democrats Try to Look Forward but Are Still Haunted by 2016 - The New York Times

posts.author: The Associated Press
posts.title: Democrats Try to Look Forward but Are Still Haunted by 2016 - The New York Times
posts.text:
Democrats Try to Look Forward but Are Still Haunted by 2016 By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Continue reading the main story Time has not healed the Democratic party's wounds. On Election Day 2016, Democrats suffered a devastating and shocking loss. A year later, they're still sorting through the wreckage. The infighting, the divisive personalities and the questions about how it happened are still front and center, threatening to hold the party back in elections on Tuesday and into next year's midterms. Hillary Clinton is on a tour promoting her book on last year's campaign, entitled "What Happened." The man she defeated in the party's presidential primaries, Bernie Sanders, and former Vice President Joe Biden are the two top possible presidential contenders in 2020. And just in time for a crucial race for Virginia governor, the Democratic National Committee's former chairwoman, Donna Brazile, last week reopened the wounds over whether the party tilted the primary in Clinton's favor. "2016 may be the first year on record that is actually 23 months long," said Jesse Ferguson, a former Clinton campaign aide. Ferguson, like many Democrats, is aware of the danger in dwelling on the past. He noted that, after Republicans failed to defeat Barack Obama in 2012, the GOP commissioned an "autopsy" that argued the party should moderate its stands on immigration to win growing minority communities. Really? Trump promptly won the next presidential election on a hardline immigration platform. 
Advertisement Continue reading the main story Trump isn't making moving on easy. During the campaign, he gleefully stoked the Sanders-Clinton division, touting hacked DNC emails that purported to show how party leaders tilted the primary toward Clinton. He hasn't let up much, now arguing that federal prosecutors should be investigating this collusion rather than his own campaign's possible coordination with Russia, whom intelligence officials blame for the DNC hack. The president is pouring salt in what may be the party's deepest wound. Sanders supporters pushed their own candidate to lead the DNC this winter, but Rep. Keith Ellison of Minnesota was narrowly defeated by former Labor Secretary Tom Perez and now is Perez's deputy. Perez's predecessor was Brazile, who is now is promoting her own book about last year's election — and her take on the race is rattling Democrats. She claims she thought about trying to replace Clinton with Biden after the Democratic nominee fainted in September. And Brazile says a fundraising agreement between the Clinton campaign and the DNC gave the candidate too much control over party resources. Some Democrats were dismayed to see this division re-emerge just days before a critical race for Virginia governor where the party's candidate is in a tight race. "We have a president who his dismantling every institution that we hold dear," said Robert Becker, a senior adviser to Sanders' presidential race, who was not critical of Brazile's timing but wants recriminations to end. "It's time to bury this hatchet. We need to get into the business of winning some elections here." Newsletter Sign Up Please verify you're not a robot by clicking the box. Invalid email address. Please re-enter. You must select a newsletter to subscribe to. Sign Up You agree to receive occasional updates and special offers for The New York Times's products and services. Thank you for subscribing. An error has occurred. Please try again later. You are already subscribed to this email. Opt out or contact us anytime The party has several big choices to make. Some argue for a greater focus on white voters who didn't graduate from college, a demographic that swung sharply to Trump, especially in the Rust Belt states that handed the president his Electoral College margin of victory. Others contend the party has to reach out to more affluent, college-educated whites who may lean conservative but are disgusted by Trump. Still others call for an intense focus on young, black and Latino voters to turbocharge the base of the party. "We're only talking about 2016 in a way that will help us in 2018," said Rebecca Katz, a New York-based Democratic strategist who has advocated for the party bringing in more liberal voters. "If we're going to win in 2018, we have to get our base out to the polls." There have been some promising signs on that front. Democrats have a shot at capturing the House majority next year, thanks to GOP retirements and solid recruitment of candidates in competitive seats. The Democrats need to flip 24 seats to win control of the House, and their top targets are the 23 districts where Clinton prevailed over Trump last year. The Senate poses a greater challenge, with 10 Democrats seeking re-election in states Trump won. 
Advertisement Continue reading the main story The party is awash in new candidates and money is pouring in for its House races. According to an analysis by the publication Roll Call, 16 Democratic challengers outraised Republican incumbents in the most recent quarter. Meanwhile, the Republicans are engaged in their own brutal infighting. Two retiring senators have warned that Trump is a danger. Former presidential counselor Steve Bannon is seeking primary challengers to other GOP senators. The Republicans' legislative agenda is at risk of complete collapse, and speculation swirls that prominent Republicans like Ohio Gov. John Kasich could take Trump on in 2020. The Democrats have dozens of elected officials thinking about the presidential race, but two party elders loom over the field -- Sanders, 76, and Biden, 74. Still, Democrats argue that, unlike last election, no candidate has an obvious advantage with the party establishment. "No one is freezing the field this time around," strategist Jim Manley said. Jeff Weaver, who was Sanders' 2016 campaign manager, argues that the splits in the party are just the latest version of a battle that's been raging ever since the 1990s between liberal activists and a more centrist establishment. "It keeps bubbling up, and until that's addressed it's going to keep bubbling up and continue to affect elections," Weaver said. ___

thread.title: Austrian Swimming Champion Banned For Doping
thread.title_full: Austrian Swimming Champion Banned For Doping

posts.author: admin
posts.title: Austrian Swimming Champion Banned For Doping
posts.text: November 7, 2017 | Posted in Steroids Blog The Austrian Anti-Doping Legal Committee has announced that Sebastian Steffan has tested positive for Heptaminol. The 20-year-old tested positive for the amino alcohol classified as a vasoconstrictor. Heptaminol , a blood booster that improves cardiac contraction, is included in the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) list of prohibited substances . The Austrian swimming champion has received a doping ban of 12 months and Steffan has four weeks to appeal the punishment. In a statement on website of the Austrian Swimming Federation, OSV President Arno Pajek said the OSV has a zero tolerance limit in terms of doping. Pajek added Sebastian Steffan has been suspended with immediate effect and also commented that we will also discuss further possible measures in the course of an internal disciplinary procedure. In another development, Chinese swimmer Liu Zixuan delivered an adverse analytical finding of a sample at the Chinese National Games in early September. A relative-veteran on that Chinese relay, the 17-years old swam the 2nd leg of China’s silver-medal winning women’s 800 free relay at the 2017 World Championships. It was revealed that Liu tested positive for a diuretic hydrochlorothiazide. The Chinese Anti-Doping Agency (CHINADA) has provisionally suspended Liu as of the date of notice of the A Sample. Results of the swimmer from the meet have been annulled. Zixuan was also a member of the winning 400 free relay and finished 2nd individually in the women’s 200 free at the meet.

thread.section_title: Head and Neck Diseases by Alexandros G.Sfakianakis
thread.title: Osseointegration of zirconia dental implants in animal investigations: A systematic review and meta-analysis
thread.title_full: Osseointegration of zirconia dental implants in animal investigations: A systematic review and meta-analysis

posts.author: Alexandros Sfakianakis (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Osseointegration of zirconia dental implants in animal investigations: A systematic review and meta-analysis
posts.text:
Publication date: Available online 6 November 2017
Source: Dental Materials
Author(s): Stefano Pieralli, Ralf-Joachim Kohal, Emilia Lopez Hernandez, Sam Doerken, Benedikt Christopher Spies
ObjectiveTo determine the osseointegration rate of zirconium dioxide (ZrO2) dental implants in preclinical investigations.DataData on the osseointegration rate was extracted considering the bone to implant contact (BIC), removal torque analysis (RTQ) and push-in tests. Meta analyses were conducted using multilevel multivariable mixed-effects linear regression models. The Šidák method was used in case of multiple testing.SourcesAn electronic screening of the literature (MEDLINE/Pubmed, Cochrane Library and Embase) and a supplementary manual search were performed. Animal investigations with a minimum sample size of 3 units evaluating implants made of zirconia (ZrO2) or its composites (ZrO2>50vol.%) were included.Study selectionThe search provided 4577 articles, and finally 54 investigations were included and analyzed. Fifty-two studies included implants made from zirconia, 4 zirconia composite implants and 37 titanium implants. In total, 3435 implants were installed in 954 animals.ConclusionsNo significant influence of the evaluated bulk materials on the outcomes of interest could be detected. When comparing different animal models, significant differences for the evaluated variables could be found. These results might be of interest for the design of further animal investigations.

http://ift.tt/2hh1Hff

posts.author: VivienLavely
posts.text:
Oh with numbers at that point I tend to indulge in something high fat, with carbs and protein. Like my sugar free frozen yogurt, or sugar free cookies with heavy cream (dun judge! it's delicious and I can't tolerate the carbs in milk). I tend to eat about 1hr before bed to right before bed, that seemed to help as well.
My schedule is wonky, I eat around 8PM, test at 10 with a snack, snack again around midnight to 1AM right before bed. I found if I went too long from night snack to waking up my sugars were high for some reason.
You could be throwing sugars due to "starvation mode".
I hope this helps some!

thread.title: Kinh nghiệm tiết kiệm tối đa khi mở siêu thị mini
thread.title_full: Kinh nghiệm tiết kiệm tối đa khi mở siêu thị mini

posts.author: Nguyễn Hoàng Anh (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Kinh nghiệm tiết kiệm tối đa khi mở siêu thị mini
posts.text:
TƯ VẤN TIẾT KIỆM TỐI ĐA CHI PHÍ KHI MỞ SIÊU THỊ MINI 

Với lợi thế có nhiều năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực tham mưu setup siêu thị cho nhiều hệ thống siêu thị tổng hợp, siêu thị mini, siêu thị tiện lợi, siêu thị điện máy, các cửa hàng tạp hóa, …. hôm nay công ty TPP xin chia sẻ với quý doanh nghiệp, cá nhân đang có ý định mở siêu thị về những lưu ý giúp tằn tiện tối đa phí tổn khi mở siêu thị mini. Đừng bỏ qua bài viết này, kiên cố chúng sẽ hữu dụng với bạn.
MỞ SIÊU THỊ MINI CẦN GÌ? 

Bất cứ ai khi bắt đầu kinh doanh bán lẻ nói chung và siêu thị nói riêng đều có một thắc mắc giống nhau đó là cần những gì khi bắt đầu mở siêu thị/cửa hàng?
  
Sau đây là một số vấn đề cần thiết phải thực hiện trước khi bắt tay vào setup hệ thống siêu thị của bạn:
Tìm mặt bằng: Mặt dù khi chọn mặt bằng còn phụ thuộc rất nhiều vào nhân tố vốn mà bạn đang có. Thế nhưng công ty TPP khuyên bạn nên ở gần những khu dân cư, có chỗ đỗ xe ô tô và xe máy, tránh nằm quá sâu trong các con hẻm nhỏ, khu dân cư loáng thoáng.
Trang thiết bị bán hàng: Khi mở cửa hàng, siêu thị kiên cố bạn phải cần những trang thiết bị bán hàng như: Máy in hóa đơn, máy in mã vạch, máy tính tiền, phần mềm quản lý bán hàng, sổ sách ghi chép, các thiết bị an ninh (cổng từ, camera quan sát),…

Những nguồn cung cấp hàng hóa: Trước khi mở siêu thị bạn phải kiếm được nguồn hàng, phải có đủ thông báo về giá cả trước để so sánh. Đừng quên khảo sát giá cả của các siêu thị phụ cận để tham khảo về giá cả họ bán và song song đưa ra được mức giá hợp cho siêu thị của mình.

Nhân sự: hẳn nhiên không thể thiếu việc chuẩn bị nhân sự phục vụ cho siêu thị của bạn như: viên chức bán hàng, viên chức thu ngân, viên chức chăm nom khách hàng, viên chức giữ xe, bảo vệ,…
MỞ SIÊU THỊ MINI CẦN BAO NHIÊU VỐN?
Đây chính là câu hỏi mà công ty TPP nhận được nhiều nhất kể từ khi cung cấp dịch vụ tham mưu setup siêu thị đến nay. Theo kinh nghiệm của chúng tôi thì quý khách hàng cần bỏ ra ít nhất là triệu khikinh doanh siêu thị mini.
Tiền mặt bằng khoảng 150m2 + xây dựng và trang trí là: 150m2 x 650.000 = 97.500.000 đồng
30 triệu đồng chi cho việc mua kệ siêu thị.
15 triệu cho máy tính tiền và lương tối thiểu 5 viên chức hướng dẫn cho khách hàng
Các chi tiêu khác
Tóm lại: Chỉ cần khoảng 200 triệu đồng là bạn đủ để kinh dinh cho một siêu thị mini rồi.
 
XÁC ĐỊNH ĐẦU RA CỦA HÀNG HOÁ 
cứ vào thu nhập và nhu cầu của người dân xung quanh khu vực siêu thị của bạn mà có thể bán những mặt hàng phù hợp. Điều quan yếu nhất trong việc chọn lọc hàng hóa đó chính là giá phải rẻ hơn đối thủ cạnh tranh, nhiều sản phẩm mới, chất lượng cao để cuộn khách hàng.
XÁC ĐỊNH ĐỐI TƯỢNG SẼ BÁN CHỦ YẾU 
Phải xác định được đối tượng mua hàng của bạn là ai vị điều này rất quan yếu trong việc xác định được nhóm hàng chính yếu bạn sẽ bán.
Thí dụ: Nếu bạn bán cho công nhân nên chọn lọc những nhóm hàng tiêu dùng cần yếu dành cho công nhân, bán hàng tiêu dùng cho người dân và hộ gia đình thì chọn những mặt hàng cấp thiết hàng ngày cho các hộ gia đình,…
SẮM CÁC TRANG THIẾT BỊ CẦN THIẾT 
Những thiết bị cần thiết cho một siêu thị mini bao gồm: Giá kệ siêu thị, bàn thu ngân, tủ đông – tủ mát, camera an ninh, cổng từ, thiết bị quản lý bán hàng: Máy in, máy máy đọc mã vạch, máy tính tiền,…
Bàn thu ngân: Có thể chọn bàn gỗ ép để tiết kiệmvới mức giá tầm 500.000đ – 800.000đ/ cái tùy thiết kế. Nếu bạn chọn bàn thu ngân gỗ MDF, măt inox thì giá chừng 3.,5 triệu/ bàn dài 1,8m. Những sản phẩm bàn thu ngân chuyên dụng trong siêu thị lớn có giá khoảng 6 -7 triệu đồng/cái.

Tủ đông – tủ mát: Theo kinh nghiệm nhiều năm cung cấp dịch vụ tư vấn setup siêu thị của TPP thì bạn nên chọn tủ mát của cocacola, vinamilk hoặc THtrue milk,… Để xin được tủ này cần giấy phép đăng ký kinh doanh, hộ khẩu hoặc chứng minh thư nhân dân. Nên xin tủ của cocacola bởi thương hiệu này dễ xin hơn, chỉ sau khoảng 15 ngày là đã có tủ. Đặc biệt, mỗi tháng nhà cung cấp còn tương trợ chừng khoảng 200k tiền điện được quy đổi ra hàng hóa.
Tủ để đồ: Nên trang bị tủ để đồ vì khách không thể mang theo túi xách vào siêu thị của bạn được. Một chiếc tủ chừng 12 ngăn là có lí cho một siêu thị mini, giá của nó chừng 2,4 triệu/tủ.
Thiết bị an ninh: Để đảm bảo an toàn, tránh thất thoát hàng hóa thì bạn nhất định phải lắp đặt các thiết bị an ninh như camera quan sát, cổng từ an ninh,…
Thiết bị bán hàng: Những thiết bị này là không thể thiếu. Hàng hóa trong siêu thị gồm rất nhiều mặt hàng, khó nhớ khôn cùng do đó phần mềm quản lý bán hàng sẽ giúp bạn giải quyết những khó khăn này.
Trên đây là những lưu ý để có thể tần tiện tối đa uổng khi mở siêu thị mini, công ty TPP hy vọng bạn sẽ có khởi đầu kinh dinh phát đạt cùng siêu thị mini của mình.
Quý khách hàng có nhu cầu tham vấn, setup siêu thị hoặc các dịch vụ kế toán, đào tạo viên chức,…vui lòng hệ trọng ngay với TPP để được hỗ trợ nhanh chóng, tiết kiệm.

thread.title: ایرانی‌ ها در سال چند لامپ می‌ خرند؟
